context: Is this game compatiable with Windows 8.1 64 bit edition ?
response: I have Windows 7 so I can't say for sure; but my guess is that it would work well on 8.1 64 bit edition.

context: I am having trouble connecting. I followed the short instructions in the package but cannot get controller to charge or connect.
response: There is a small hole in the back ....have u tried to reset the control??

context: In the demo the missions are timed. Is it timed in the real game?
response: Yes. All missions have a time limit. However you can go into Moga Woods for "free hunt" which is not timed and stay there as long as you'd like.

context: Can it fit 6 games along with a thicker stylus? I have an older version of this case that only holds 3 games that fits towards the front
response: It's got 6 pockets for 6 game cartridges (fits very snugly), and as long as your stylus isn't too much thicker than the default one it should fit no problem :)

context: How is the Internet functionality? Looking to give to daughter in lieu of a tablet. She would use it to listen to YouTube, play Internet games, etc.
response: the DS/3DS is Not capable of doing your requested objectives. Tablet is the best way for what you are looking for.

context: Does it work with Windows 8.1 and is it compatible with a CH stick?
response: Yes, this will work with Windows 8.1 with recent drivers.

context: what is the storage in this unit and the internal memory
response: It comes with no real significant storage that is worth noting,  you can basically download nothing.I'd say get it wit this:http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B006PP4136/ as it's a memory card,  game case, protective soft sleeve case and a screen protector.

context: My Windows says it's Windows 7 Ultimate. Will it play well on my computer?
response: Yes. I used it with Windows 7.

context: I have win 7 and an early version of Civ 4 (the "Game of the Year" edition).  I cannot install it on Windows 7.  Will this version work with win 7?
does this joystick work with windows 7?
In the demo the missions are timed. Is it timed in the real game?
response: All missions are timed, but generally time is not an issue as most missions can be finished with ease within the alotted time.
